MESSAGE.JP: 夕飯を食べている最中に、携帯が震えた。
MESSAGE.EN: My phone started vibrating in the middle of dinner.
MESSAGE.Translation: My phone started vibrating in the middle of dinner.

MESSAGE.JP: 食べ終えた後に確かめてみると、朱鷺戸さんからだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I checked it after finishing and found a text from Tokido-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: I checked it after finishing and found a text from Tokido-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 『一時間後に昇降口で　Ｔ』
MESSAGE.EN: [In one hour at the entrance. -T]
MESSAGE.Translation: [In one hour at the entrance. -T]

MESSAGE.JP: 待ち合わせの時間と場所の指定だった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was the rendezvous time and place.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was the rendezvous time and place.

MESSAGE.JP: よくわからない探索が終わるまで、夜はもう恭介たちと遊べなくなるんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Until I finish this incomprehensible search, I won't be able to play with Kyousuke and the rest in the evenings.
MESSAGE.Translation: Until I finish this incomprehensible search, I won't be able to play with Kyousuke and the rest in the evenings.

MESSAGE.JP: 放課後に野球ができてるだけでも、ありがたい話なんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I was thankful that I can still play baseball after school.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was thankful that I can still play baseball after school.

MESSAGE.JP: 贅沢は言ってられない。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't have the luxury of being able to choose what I did.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't have the luxury of being able to choose what I did.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（…こっちは命がけなんだもんな）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(...My life is at risk here.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(...My life is at risk here.)

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「あなた、夜はもっと周りを気にしなさいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Hey, please pay more attention to your surroundings at night.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Hey, please pay more attention to your surroundings at night.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 顔を合わせるなり、注意を受ける。
MESSAGE.EN: The moment we met, I was scolded.
MESSAGE.Translation: The moment we met, I was scolded.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわ、元通りになってる！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wow, it's back to normal!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wow, it's back to normal!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「そりゃなるでしょ…机と椅子がピラミッド状に積まれてたら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝That's to be expected, right... after we stacked the tables and chair into a pyramid.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝That's to be expected, right... after we stacked the tables and chair into a pyramid.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「大変だから、今日のうちに終わらないかなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What a pain, I wonder if we can finish it tonight...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What a pain, I wonder if we can finish it tonight...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「それは理樹くんの活躍にもよるところね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝That depends on your performance, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝That depends on your performance, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「頭を使うことだったら期待に添えると思うんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝When it comes to using my head, I have some confidence, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝When it comes to using my head, I have some confidence, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「ファミマがどうとか言ってたくせに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Even though you suggested Family Mart back then...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Even though you suggested Family Mart back then...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、あれはなんかヘンな電波受信しちゃって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I just caught a strange signal from space...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I just caught a strange signal from space...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「理樹くんって恐いのね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝You're scaring me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝You're scaring me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 少し距離を置かれる。
MESSAGE.EN: She put some distance between us.
MESSAGE.Translation: She put some distance between us.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「滅多にないから気にしないで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Don't be scared, it doesn't happen that often.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Don't be scared, it doesn't happen that often.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「ローソンがどうとか言ってたくせに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Even though you suggested Lawson back then...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Even though you suggested Lawson back then...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、あれはなんかヘンな電波受信しちゃって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I just caught a strange signal from space...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I just caught a strange signal from space...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「理樹くんって恐いのね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝You're scaring me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝You're scaring me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 少し距離を置かれる。
MESSAGE.EN: She put some distance between us.
MESSAGE.Translation: She put some distance between us.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「滅多にないから気にしないで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Don't be scared, it doesn't happen that often.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Don't be scared, it doesn't happen that often.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「情けないパートナーね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Such a pathetic partner.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Such a pathetic partner.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ピラミッドを無言で組みたてていく。ふたりとも、なかなか情けない姿だ。
MESSAGE.EN: We rebuilt the pyramid wordlessly. We both looked quite pathetic.
MESSAGE.Translation: We rebuilt the pyramid wordlessly. We both looked quite pathetic.

MESSAGE.JP: そうしている朱鷺戸さんは、掃除当番で机を片づけてるようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: The figure of Tokido-san doing that resembled that of a girl on cleaning duty.
MESSAGE.Translation: The figure of Tokido-san doing that resembled that of a girl on cleaning duty.

MESSAGE.JP: そんな普通の女の子だったらよかったのに。
MESSAGE.EN: It'd be nice if she were actually a normal girl.
MESSAGE.Translation: It'd be nice if she were actually a normal girl.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、普通の女の子でこれだけ可愛らしかったら、僕なんて相手にされていなかっただろう。
MESSAGE.EN: But as she is such a beauty, if she were a normal girl, I probably would never have a chance.
MESSAGE.Translation: But as she is such a beauty, if she were a normal girl, I probably would never have a chance.

MESSAGE.JP: 思い出しても、教室で見た彼女は人気の的だった。
MESSAGE.EN: When I think back on it, she was really popular in the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I think back on it, she was really popular in the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: そう考えると、今の関係は複雑な思いだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I was no longer sure how to feel about our relationship.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was no longer sure how to feel about our relationship.

MESSAGE.JP: って、なんて浮ついたことを考えてるんだ僕は…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Wait, why am I thinking about such things...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Wait, why am I thinking about such things...

MESSAGE.JP: ピラミッドが完成する。
MESSAGE.EN: We completed the pyramid.
MESSAGE.Translation: We completed the pyramid.

MESSAGE.JP: ごとり。
MESSAGE.EN: *Clunk*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Clunk*.

MESSAGE.JP: 地下への入り口が開いた。
MESSAGE.EN: The underground passage opened.
MESSAGE.Translation: The underground passage opened.

MESSAGE.JP: 彼女が暗闇で先頭をいくのも当然だったわけだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She headed into the darkness as a matter of fact.
MESSAGE.Translation: She headed into the darkness as a matter of fact.

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「ストップ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Stop.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Stop.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 梯子の上に辿りついたようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It seems she arrived at the top of a ladder.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seems she arrived at the top of a ladder.

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「あたしが先に降りる。あなたもそれに続いて、すぐ射撃の準備を」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝I'll go down first. Follow me, and be ready to fire.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝I'll go down first. Follow me, and be ready to fire.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「梯子は使わない。飛び降りて。闇の中だから恐いと思うけど、２メートルと６０センチぐらい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Don't use the ladder. Jump down. It may seem scary in the dark, but it's only a 2.6 meter drop .❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Don't use the ladder. Jump down. It may seem scary in the dark, but it's only a 2.6 meter drop .❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「倒し損ねた敵は基本的にはあたしが片づける」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝I'll clean up the enemies you miss.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝I'll clean up the enemies you miss.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「ただ、その場合、敵に攻撃する時間を与えてしまうことになるから、覚悟だけはしていて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝But if you miss they'll have time to retaliate, so brace yourself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝But if you miss they'll have time to retaliate, so brace yourself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 本当にうまくいくのだろうか、この作戦は。
MESSAGE.EN: I wonder if this battle plan will work.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wonder if this battle plan will work.

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「いくわよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Let's go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Let's go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「ゲーム…スタート！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Game... start!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Game... start!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 彼女の飛び降りた後に、僕も続く。
MESSAGE.EN: After she jumped down, I followed.
MESSAGE.Translation: After she jumped down, I followed.

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「あなた…すごいわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝You... are good...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝You... are good...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え？　そうかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh? Really...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh? Really...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「完璧。パーフェクトよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝That was perfect.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝That was perfect.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも、こんなに震えたのは初めてだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But I'm trembling more than ever...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But I'm trembling more than ever...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「あれだけ落ち着いて撃ってたのに？　理樹くんは、謙虚ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Even though you fired your gun so calmly? You are so modest, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Even though you fired your gun so calmly? You are so modest, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「奇襲成功」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Surprise attack success.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Surprise attack success.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「やればできるじゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝See? You can do it if you try.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝See? You can do it if you try.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「自分でも驚いてるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I was surprised too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I was surprised too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「奇襲成功」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Surprise attack success.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Surprise attack success.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「大丈夫？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Are you alright?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Are you alright?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「たぶん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Probably...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Probably...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「さて、ここからが問題なわけだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Well then, this is where the problem starts...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Well then, this is where the problem starts...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 彼女は辺りを見回した。
MESSAGE.EN: She looked around.
MESSAGE.Translation: She looked around.

MESSAGE.JP: 地下室の言葉に相応しい、コンクリートで固められた部屋だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Befitting its name, the underground room was fortified with concrete.
MESSAGE.Translation: Befitting its name, the underground room was fortified with concrete.

MESSAGE.JP: ドアがひとつあり、彼女はその前まで歩いていく。
MESSAGE.EN: She walked up to the only door in the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: She walked up to the only door in the room.

MESSAGE.JP: 開くことを確認したようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It seems that she's going to try opening it.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seems that she's going to try opening it.

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「この向こうには、入り組んだ地下迷宮が広がってるわけだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝On the other side, there's a complicated underground maze.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝On the other side, there's a complicated underground maze.❞

MESSAGE.JP: またでた。僕を混乱させる非日常的なキーワード。
MESSAGE.EN: There it is. Another one of those keywords that messes up my normal daily life.
MESSAGE.Translation: There it is. Another one of those keywords that messes up my normal daily life.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕たちの通う学校の地下には迷宮が広がり、その奥深くには秘宝が眠っているらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: It seems a hidden treasure is lying in the depths of this sprawling underground maze under our school.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seems a hidden treasure is lying in the depths of this sprawling underground maze under our school.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうするの…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What are we going to do...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What are we going to do...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「行くに決まってるじゃない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝We're going in, of course.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝We're going in, of course.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも、地下迷宮なんて…今日一日で終わらないよね…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But, an underground maze... we won't be able to finish tonight, right...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But, an underground maze... we won't be able to finish tonight, right...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「そうね。食料と水も必要だし、続きは明日にしましょうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝That's right. We need food and water, so let's continue tomorrow.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝That's right. We need food and water, so let's continue tomorrow.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「続きって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Continue...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Continue...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ねぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は不安を口にする。
MESSAGE.EN: I voiced my worries.
MESSAGE.Translation: I voiced my worries.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「こうなった以上は、闇の執行部は問答無用で襲いかかってくるんじゃないかな…例えば寮で寝てる時とか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If we leave things like this, won't we be ruthlessly attacked by the Darkness Executives... for example in the dorms tonight...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If we leave things like this, won't we be ruthlessly attacked by the Darkness Executives... for example in the dorms tonight...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「そうね。次起きたら、監禁されてても不思議じゃないわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Right. The next time you wake up, you may already be a prisoner.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Right. The next time you wake up, you may already be a prisoner.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だったら今日終わらせなきゃ駄目なんじゃ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then we must finish this today...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then we must finish this today...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「昼に寝たらいいのよ。あなたなら、それが許されるんじゃないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝It's alright if you sleep during the day. In your case, nobody would find it unusual, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝It's alright if you sleep during the day. In your case, nobody would find it unusual, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 彼女は僕の病気のことを知っている。
MESSAGE.EN: She knows about my illness.
MESSAGE.Translation: She knows about my illness.

MESSAGE.JP: そうだ。僕だけは授業中寝ても、黙認される。
MESSAGE.EN: That's right. I'll be ignored if I sleep during class.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's right. I'll be ignored if I sleep during class.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも…きみはどうするの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But... how about you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But... how about you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「あたしは半分起きて半分寝てるような、半覚醒状態で睡眠をとることができるの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝I can be half asleep, half awake, and maintain a waking sleep state.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝I can be half asleep, half awake, and maintain a waking sleep state.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wow...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wow...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「普通じゃないでしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Not at all normal, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Not at all normal, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が引いたように映ったのか、彼女は自虐的に笑った。
MESSAGE.EN: She gave a small, self-tormenting laugh after seeing my perplexed look.
MESSAGE.Translation: She gave a small, self-tormenting laugh after seeing my perplexed look.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、なんていうか、かっこいいよっ、兵士みたいで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think that's cool, you're like a soldier.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think that's cool, you're like a soldier.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「兵士もやったわ。傭兵だけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝I worked as a soldier too. A mercenary, though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝I worked as a soldier too. A mercenary, though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は言葉に詰まる。
MESSAGE.EN: My words were stuck in my throat.
MESSAGE.Translation: My words were stuck in my throat.

MESSAGE.JP: それは現実的に考えてしまうと、かっこいいなんて安易には形容しがたいものに代わってしまった…。
MESSAGE.EN: When I really think about it, maybe ❛cool❜ was a poor choice of words...
MESSAGE.Translation: When I really think about it, maybe ❛cool❜ was a poor choice of words...

MESSAGE.JP: 睡眠も彼女にとっては『長めの休憩』と同じ扱いにして生きてきたのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: Perhaps to her sleep was nothing more than a 'long break'.
MESSAGE.Translation: Perhaps to her sleep was nothing more than a 'long break'.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ごめん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「別にいいのよ、あたしのことなんて。気にしないで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝That's fine. Don't worry about me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝That's fine. Don't worry about me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「じゃ、今日はこれで切り上げて、寮に戻りましょ。寝ないにしても自分の部屋にいたほうが落ち着くでしょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Then, let's stop here and return to the dorm. Even if you can't sleep, you'll feel more comfortable in your room, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Then, let's stop here and return to the dorm. Even if you can't sleep, you'll feel more comfortable in your room, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 別れの際。僕は訊きたくなった。
MESSAGE.EN: Right before we were to go our separate ways, I wanted to ask.
MESSAGE.Translation: Right before we were to go our separate ways, I wanted to ask.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ねぇ…ほんとに僕でいいの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey... are your really all right with me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey... are your really all right with me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「ん？　なんの話？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Mn? What are you talking about?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Mn? What are you talking about?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「パートナーの話だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Being your partner.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Being your partner.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「よく考えてみたら、きみの正体は敵にもばれちゃったわけだし、パートナーが僕である意味がなくなってると思うんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝When I think about it, the enemy already knows who you are, so there's no point in me being your partner.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝When I think about it, the enemy already knows who you are, so there's no point in me being your partner.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「そういえばそうね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Now that you mention it, that's right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Now that you mention it, that's right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「謙吾や真人とか…僕より向いている人がいるよ…紹介しようか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There are people who'd be better at it... like Kengo and Masato... should I introduce them to you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There are people who'd be better at it... like Kengo and Masato... should I introduce them to you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「それは、あなたのほうに問題があるんじゃない？　脅されたんでしょ？　このことは他言無用だと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Wouldn't that be a problem for you? Weren't you threatened not to speak to anyone?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Wouldn't that be a problem for you? Weren't you threatened not to speak to anyone?❞

MESSAGE.JP: そうだった…。
MESSAGE.EN: That's right...
MESSAGE.Translation: That's right...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも、きみが勝手に連れていく分にはいいんじゃないかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But, you could just have them come along with you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But, you could just have them come along with you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「あなた、鈴って子を守りたいんじゃないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝You, don't you want to protect this girl Rin?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝You, don't you want to protect this girl Rin?❞

MESSAGE.JP: え、なんでいきなり鈴の名が出てくるんだ？
MESSAGE.EN: Eh, why did she bring Rin up?
MESSAGE.Translation: Eh, why did she bring Rin up?

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「それは確かにあなたが動かなければ、その子も巻き込まれずに済む」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝It's true that they will leave her alone if you don't do anything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝It's true that they will leave her alone if you don't do anything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「でも、あなたは進むこともできるのよ？　それもその子を守る方法でもあるのよ？　わかる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝But, you move forward too, you know? That's another way to protect her. Do you understand?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝But, you move forward too, you know? That's another way to protect her. Do you understand?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや…よくわからないけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well... I don't really get it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well... I don't really get it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「つまり、あなたの力で敵を根こそぎ粉砕することもできる、という意味よ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝In other words, I'm saying you could use your strength to thoroughly destroy the enemy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝In other words, I'm saying you could use your strength to thoroughly destroy the enemy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: それでようやくぴんときた。
MESSAGE.EN: Then it finally dawned to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then it finally dawned to me.

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「あなたは進む権利を得てるのよ。それを捨てるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝You earned the right to move forward. Are you throwing it away?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝You earned the right to move forward. Are you throwing it away?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「捨てる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'll throw it away.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'll throw it away.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「そうそう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝That's right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝That's right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「えっ、捨てるの!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Eh, you're throwing it away!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Eh, you're throwing it away!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: とてもじゃないけど、これ以上は付き合えきれない。
MESSAGE.EN: I hate saying this, but I can't accompany her anymore.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hate saying this, but I can't accompany her anymore.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「謙吾か真人を紹介するよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'll introduce you to Kengo or Masato.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'll introduce you to Kengo or Masato.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんだったら恭介でもいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kyousuke's fine too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kyousuke's fine too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「誰がいい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Who do you want?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Who do you want?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「…いらない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝...I don't need them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝...I don't need them.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「いいわ。誰もいらない。結構よ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝That's fine. I don't need anyone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝That's fine. I don't need anyone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「大丈夫なの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Are you all right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Are you all right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「あんたなんかに心配されたくないわ。さいっっっていの気分よ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝You worrying about me. It's the wooooorst feeling.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝You worrying about me. It's the wooooorst feeling.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「あああーっ、もうっ、いいわっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Aaaaah, damn it!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Aaaaah, damn it!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「もう会うこともないわね。さようなら、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝We won't meet again. Farewell, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝We won't meet again. Farewell, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そう言い残して、来た道を引き返していった。
MESSAGE.EN: That said, she turned back in the direction we came from.
MESSAGE.Translation: That said, she turned back in the direction we came from.

MESSAGE.JP: 一緒に帰るのは、気まずくて、僕は少し時間を置いてから、寮に戻った。
MESSAGE.EN: It felt awkward to go with her, so I waited a while before returning to the dorm.
MESSAGE.Translation: It felt awkward to go with her, so I waited a while before returning to the dorm.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おまえ、どこいってたんだ？　みんな探してたんだぞ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Where were you? Everyone was looking for you, you know?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Where were you? Everyone was looking for you, you know?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ごめん…用があって学校にいたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry... I had some business at school.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry... I had some business at school.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんでまた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What, again?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What, again?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ちょっと厄介ごとに巻き込まれてね。でももう大丈夫。平気だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I got caught in something troublesome, but it's alright now. I'm fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I got caught in something troublesome, but it's alright now. I'm fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんだよっ、そりゃ筋肉の使いどころだったんじゃねぇのか!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What? Wasn't that the time to use these muscles!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What? Wasn't that the time to use these muscles!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ねぇから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんだ、ねぇのか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What, it wasn't...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What, it wasn't...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ま、詮索はしねーけどさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Well, I won't poke into it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Well, I won't poke into it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いい子だね、真人は。さ、気にせずに大人しく寝ようね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You're a good kid, Masato. Come on, let's turn in for the night.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You're a good kid, Masato. Come on, let's turn in for the night.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ああ、そうすっか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Okay, whatever.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Okay, whatever.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ふとんに入ってから、よく考えてみる。
MESSAGE.EN: After I got in bed, I thought about it.
MESSAGE.Translation: After I got in bed, I thought about it.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は間違っていない。誰だって僕の立場だったら、降りるはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I wasn't wrong. Anyone in my position would've backed down.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wasn't wrong. Anyone in my position would've backed down.

MESSAGE.JP: もう鈴にだって危険は及ばないはずだから…。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin isn't going to be in danger anymore...
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin isn't going to be in danger anymore...

MESSAGE.JP: 正解だ…。
MESSAGE.EN: That was the right choice...
MESSAGE.Translation: That was the right choice...

MESSAGE.JP: 恨むなら、夜の校舎に忍び込んだ二日前の自分だ。
MESSAGE.EN: If there's someone at fault, it would be me for sneaking into the school building two days ago.
MESSAGE.Translation: If there's someone at fault, it would be me for sneaking into the school building two days ago.

MESSAGE.JP: こうなってしまったからには、勇気を持って進むことを選ぼう。
MESSAGE.EN: Since it's come to this, I'm going to muster my courage and move forward.
MESSAGE.Translation: Since it's come to this, I'm going to muster my courage and move forward.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介がいない、初めてのミッションだ。
MESSAGE.EN: This would be my first mission without Kyousuke.
MESSAGE.Translation: This would be my first mission without Kyousuke.

MESSAGE.JP: いつか勇姿を見てもらいたい。
MESSAGE.EN: I wanted to become that gallant figure.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wanted to become that gallant figure.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「わかったよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I got it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I got it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「そ。だったら今は大人しく戻って寝なさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Right. Then be good and return to your dorm and sleep.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Right. Then be good and return to your dorm and sleep.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「といいたいところだけど、朝まで頑張って起きていなさいね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Is what I'd like to say, but try to stay awake until morning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Is what I'd like to say, but try to stay awake until morning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、試してみるよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, I'll try...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, I'll try...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おまえ、どこいってたんだ？　みんな探してたんだぞ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Where were you? Everyone was looking for you, you know?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Where were you? Everyone was looking for you, you know?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ごめん…用があって学校にいたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry... I had some business at school.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry... I had some business at school.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …と、本当のことを思わず言ってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Oops, I said where I really was.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Oops, I said where I really was.

MESSAGE.JP: 気を付けないと、真人やみんなまで巻き込んでしまいかねない。
MESSAGE.EN: If I'm not careful, Masato and everyone may get caught up in this.
MESSAGE.Translation: If I'm not careful, Masato and everyone may get caught up in this.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんでまた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What, again?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What, again?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「勉強をね、教えてたんだよ。しばらく学校を休んでいた友達がいて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I was helping someone who missed school for a while with studying.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I was helping someone who missed school for a while with studying.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんだよおまえ、オレだけじゃ教えたりねぇのかよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hey, ain't it enough helping me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hey, ain't it enough helping me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんていうか、友達がいない子で不憫でさ…後、真人にはノートを写させてあげてるだけだからぜんぜん教えてないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I felt sorry for the kid since he has no friends... Besides, all you ever do is copy my notes. I'm not actually teaching you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I felt sorry for the kid since he has no friends... Besides, all you ever do is copy my notes. I'm not actually teaching you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「へぇー…意外に面倒見いいのな、おまえ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Huh... you are unexpectedly good at taking care of others.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Huh... you are unexpectedly good at taking care of others.❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんとか信じてもらえたようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I somehow fooled him.
MESSAGE.Translation: I somehow fooled him.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「夜はしばらく遅くなるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'll be out late for a while.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'll be out late for a while.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「そいつは寂しいな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I'll feel lonely...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I'll feel lonely...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あとさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「電灯、朝までつけっぱなしにしてもいい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Can I keep the light on till morning?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Can I keep the light on till morning?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんでだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Why?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Why?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「その子に教えてあげてるぶん、自分の勉強がはかどらなくて、徹夜しようかな、と…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Because I'm helping that kid, I don't have time for my own studies, so I'm thinking of pulling an all-nighter...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Because I'm helping that kid, I don't have time for my own studies, so I'm thinking of pulling an all-nighter...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おまえどこまで献身的なんだよっ、ありえねぇぜ、普通っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Just how selfless can you be? That's abnormal.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Just how selfless can you be? That's abnormal.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあ、僕にはありえるんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, it's normal for me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, it's normal for me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「献血とかしまくって失血死しそうだな。心配だぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You might donate so much blood you'd die. I'm worried.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You might donate so much blood you'd die. I'm worried.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「大丈夫、わきまえてるつもりだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's fine, I know when to stop.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's fine, I know when to stop.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なら、いいけどよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝That's alright then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝That's alright then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人が寝ると、僕は机に向かって勉強を始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: After Masato fell asleep, I go to my desk and started studying.
MESSAGE.Translation: After Masato fell asleep, I go to my desk and started studying.

MESSAGE.JP: これからは授業中に寝ることになるんだから、予習はしっかりしておこう。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm going to sleep during class, so I should study now.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm going to sleep during class, so I should study now.

MESSAGE.JP: 十分すぎるぐらい、予習はした。
MESSAGE.EN: I had studied more than enough.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had studied more than enough.

MESSAGE.JP: なのにまだまだ夜は明けない。
MESSAGE.EN: But the night was still young.
MESSAGE.Translation: But the night was still young.

MESSAGE.JP: まだ３時か…。
MESSAGE.EN: It was only 3 o'clock.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was only 3 o'clock.

MESSAGE.JP: 何もすることがない。
MESSAGE.EN: I had nothing to do.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had nothing to do.

MESSAGE.JP: なんて退屈なんだ、夜中とは。
MESSAGE.EN: Why was the middle of the night so boring?
MESSAGE.Translation: Why was the middle of the night so boring?

MESSAGE.JP: 眠たい…。
MESSAGE.EN: I wanted to sleep...
MESSAGE.Translation: I wanted to sleep...

MESSAGE.JP: もう寝ようかな…。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe I should sleep...
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe I should sleep...

MESSAGE.JP: いやいや、寝たら大変だ！
MESSAGE.EN: No no, I couldn't sleep!
MESSAGE.Translation: No no, I couldn't sleep!

MESSAGE.JP: 窓の外は闇夜。そこに誰かが立っている気がして、震える。
MESSAGE.EN: It was pitch black outside. When I thought that someone might have been standing there, I shivered.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was pitch black outside. When I thought that someone might have been standing there, I shivered.

MESSAGE.JP: 眠気も一気に冷めた。
MESSAGE.EN: All the sleepiness went away.
MESSAGE.Translation: All the sleepiness went away.

MESSAGE.JP: 明後日以降の予習もしてしまおう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I decided to study for the day after tomorrow too...
MESSAGE.Translation: I decided to study for the day after tomorrow too...
